naslov: Okrug Donji, super luksuzna vila u drugom redu do mora, 326 m2 (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Super luksuzna i moderna vila na tri etaže u Okrugu Donjem, u drugom redu do mora. Novogradnja, s 326 m2 stambenog prostora, vanjskim grijanim bazenom od 28 m2 i izuzetno uređenom okućnicom od oko 450 m². Suteren sačinjavaju kupaonica, praonica rublja te velika soba od 53 kvadrata koja je idealna za uređenje kao fitness centar, sauna ili već prema želji. U prizemlju se nalazi vrlo prostrana blagovaonica, dnevni boravak i kuhinja od ukupno 76 kvadrata, te kupaonica i ostava. Tu je i velika terasa s modernim bazenom, kao i garaža za dva vozila. Na katu se prostiru četiri spavaće sobe s još tri kupaonice, kao i raskošna vanjska terasa. Vila je bogato opremljena s klima uređajima u svakoj sobi, dvije dizalice topline, luksuzno opremljenim kupaonicama, suvremenom stolarijom, stiliziranim pločicama velikog formata, bezokvirnim vratima za ležeran prolaz iz jedne u drugu prostoriju te modernim sustavima video nadzora i alarma. Cijelu vilu krasi prekrasan panoramski pogled na more u kojem se može u potpunosti uživati zahvaljujući aluminijskim prozorima od poda do stropa. Objekt je opasan vrlo uređenim vrtom, a skupa sa svojim terasama, bazenom i pažljivo izvedenom atraktivnom rasvjetom na svim razinama daje ne samo dodanu vrijednost nego čini svaki boravak u vili jednim posebnim doživljajem. A na nekoliko koraka od vile nalaze se plaža i šetnica, a infrastruktura i dodatni sadržaji u blizini. --- Super luxurious and modern villa on three floors in Okrug Donji, in the second row to the sea. New construction, with 326 m2 of living space, outdoor heated pool of 28 m2 and a landscaped garden of about 450 m2. The partially subterranean floor consists of a bathroom, laundry and a large room of 53 square meters, which is ideal for arranging as a fitness center, sauna or as desired. The ground floor houses a very spacious dining room, living room and kitchen sized a total of 76 square meters, a bathroom and pantry. There is also a large terrace with a modern swimming pool, as well as a garage for two vehicles. Upstairs are four bedrooms with three more bathrooms, as well as a lavish outdoor terrace. The villa is richly equipped with air conditioning units in each room, two heat pumps, luxuriously equipped bathrooms, modern carpentry, stylized large format tiles, frameless doors for seamless passage from one room to another and modern video surveillance and alarm systems. The whole villa offers a beautiful panoramic sea view which can be fully enjoyed thanks to the aluminium floor-to-ceiling windows. The building is surrounded by a highly landscaped garden, and together with its terraces, swimming pool and meticulously designed attractive lighting on all levels, it provides not only added value but turns every stay in the villa into a memorable experience. And a few steps from the villa lies the beach and promenade, with infrastructure and additional facilities all nearby.
